name: Blades of Justice and Freedom 2
description:
The new days come true! And you have to use the Blades of Justice and Freedom again! Walk through the dungeon again in a new adventure.

Commands:

Q - Red Blade attack
E - Blue Blade attack
A W S D - Move player
Space - Jump
Mouse - Look around

Guide:

Use Q and E.
Attack everything!
See the color and use the correct blade.
